section.title: Short Writing Session
section.t: Alice writes a 500-word blog post over 45 minutes. Her PoP daemon collects 90 evidence packets (one per 30-second window). Each packet contains:

list.t: Typing cadence metrics: mean IKI of 180ms, variance 45ms^2.
Revision events: 12 backspace sequences, 3 cut-paste operations.
VDF proof with t_vdf calibrated to 30 seconds on her hardware.
Content hash binding to the document state at window close.

section.t: The Verifier confirms the chain of 90 packets spans 45 minutes of wall-clock time with consistent behavioral characteristics, producing a T2 (Standard) attestation result.

section.title: Verification Workflow
section.t: Bob receives Alice's published document with an attached PoP evidence bundle. His verification process:

list.t: Parse the evidence bundle and extract the chain of packets.
Verify each packet's HMAC and VDF proof.
Check chain continuity via prev-hash linkage.
Validate that the final content hash matches the published document.
Assess behavioral entropy against configured thresholds.
